wikipedia_page.main: Igor Anvar Kufayev  (Russian: И́горь Анва́р Kу́фаев, IPA: [ˈiɡərʲ ɐnˈvar ˈkufəɪf]; born January 5, 1966), is a Russian British artist, yogi and spiritual teacher. Also known as 'Vamadeva' (Sanskrit), which means "preserving aspect of Shiva in his peaceful, graceful and poetic form".

link_mentions.page: List of painters by name beginning with "K"
response: *Igor Kufayev (born 1966) Russian/English artist and spiritual teacher
